item.title: embedding bpf objects
item.description: Too many open files I had trouble compiling. The nix builder failed with “too many open files”. find /proc -maxdepth 1 -type d -name '[0-9]*' \ -exec bash -c "ls {}/fd/ | wc -l | tr '\n' ' '" \; \ -printf "fds (PID = %P), command: " \ -exec bash -c "tr '\0' ' ' < {}/cmdline" \; \ -exec echo \; | sort -rn | head showed systemd consumed more than 700 file descriptors on startup.
